 126:     """


 127:     Calculate the chi array (azimuthal angles) in parallel


 128: 


 129:     X1 = p1*cos(rot2)*cos(rot3) + p2*(cos(rot3)*sin(rot1)*sin(rot2) - cos(rot1)*sin(rot3)) -  L*(cos(rot1)*cos(rot3)*sin(rot2) + sin(rot1)*sin(rot3))


 130:     X2 = p1*cos(rot2)*sin(rot3) - L*(-(cos(rot3)*sin(rot1)) + cos(rot1)*sin(rot2)*sin(rot3)) +  p2*(cos(rot1)*cos(rot3) + sin(rot1)*sin(rot2)*sin(rot3))


 131:     X3 = -(L*cos(rot1)*cos(rot2)) + p2*cos(rot2)*sin(rot1) - p1*sin(rot2)


 132:     tan(Chi) =  X2 / X1


 133: 


 134: 


 135:     @param L: distance sample - PONI


 136:     @param rot1: angle1

 161:     """


 162:     Calculate the q (scattering vector) array in parallel


 163: 


 164:     X1 = p1*cos(rot2)*cos(rot3) + p2*(cos(rot3)*sin(rot1)*sin(rot2) - cos(rot1)*sin(rot3)) -  L*(cos(rot1)*cos(rot3)*sin(rot2) + sin(rot1)*sin(rot3))


 165:     X2 = p1*cos(rot2)*sin(rot3) - L*(-(cos(rot3)*sin(rot1)) + cos(rot1)*sin(rot2)*sin(rot3)) +  p2*(cos(rot1)*cos(rot3) + sin(rot1)*sin(rot2)*sin(rot3))


 166:     X3 = -(L*cos(rot1)*cos(rot2)) + p2*cos(rot2)*sin(rot1) - p1*sin(rot2)


 167:     tan(Chi) =  X2 / X1


 168: 


 169: 


 170:     @param L: distance sample - PONI


 171:     @param rot1: angle1


 172:     @param rot2: angle2


 173:     @param rot3: angle3

 177:     """
